title.en: Reading Group on Critical Theory: Adorno & Horkheimer to Habermas
title.et: Kriitilise teooria lugemisgrupp: Adornost ja Horkheimerist Habermasini

description.en: After presenting the philosophical background of critical theory, the course will examine two key texts: The Dialectic of Enlightenment by Max Horkheimer and Theodor Adorno (1944) and One-Dimensional Man by Herbert Marcuse (1964). Next the issue of culture and cultural criticism will be discussed in selected essays of Walter Benjamin, Siegfried Kracauer and Theodor Adorno. The course concludes with the work of Jürgen Habermas, Judith Butler, and Rahel Jäeggi.
description.et: Pärast tutvumist kriitilise teooria filosoofilise taustaga, keskendutakse kahele põhitekstile: Max Horkheimeri ja Theodor Adorno 'The Dialectic of Enlightenment' (1944) ning Herbert Marcuse 'One-Dimensional Man' (1964). Järgmiseks vaadeldakse kultuuri ja kultuurikriitika küsimusi Walter Benjamini, Siegfried Kracaueri ja Theodor Adorno valitud esseedes. Lõpetuseks loetakse ja arutatakse Jürgen Habermasi, Judith Butler ja Rahel Jäeggi kirjutisi.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to familiarize students with contemporary texts of political philosophy
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on tutvustada üliõpilastele tänapäeva poliitikafilosoofia tekste.

learning_outcomes.en:
The learning outcomes are a firm understanding of contemporary texts of political and social philosophy. Having passed the course, the student has also improved his or her ability to analyze philosophical texts, his or her presentations skills.

Students will also develop the following skills:

Self-Management Skills - time management, goal setting and self-motivation.

Academic skills - reading academic texts, academic writing and critical thinking.

People skills - how to communicate and participate in team work.

These will be developed during the seminar with group work and include skills for debating and for writing a well structured paper in philosophy.
learning_outcomes.et: Aine läbinud üliõpilasel on selge arusaam tänapäeva poliitika- ja sotsiaalfilosoofilia alastest kirjutistest. Ta on ka arendanud oma filosoofilise teksti analüüsimise oskust ning esitlusoskusi.
